message.original: うおおお！ 海はいつ見ても広いですね！ なぜか心湧きたちます！
message.translation: Ooh! The sea is so vast and wide! Even more at its edge!

message.original: ローテスに近い北の浜辺と 谷を隔てた南の浜辺は敵もかなり違うとか 海岸沿いを探検しましょう！
message.translation: The northern beach near Rotes and the southern beach across the valley have different enemies that dwell there. We should explore the coast!

message.original: たまに漂流船や魔物の死体が 浜辺に流れ着くそうです 何か使えるものが見つかるかもしれませんよ！
message.translation: Much washes up upon the shore. We may find something useful in the debris. We should explore!

message.original: ブリアの灯台上は見晴らしが良さそうです 落下注意ですが――！！
message.translation: The view of Breya's lighthouse is beautiful, even though it is falling apart.

message.original: 岸壁付近はハ―ピーがよく群れていますね フンが降ってこないとよいのですがっ――！
message.translation: Harpies are rampant here. We must tread carefully!
